message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire this exceptional product. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to pay $800000 for it. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that $1500000 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm confident that this product will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're still a bit hesitant about the price, but I believe this product has the potential to bring significant returns on investment. I'm willing to compromise further and offer it to you for $1100000. This is my final offer, as I'm not willing to go any lower.
